rules_text:
When Resolute Captain dies, create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token with haste.
Reborn 2–{4}{W} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for it’s reborn cost. If you do, it enters the battlefield with two additional +1/+1 counters on it and becomes reborn. When it dies while reborn, exile it.)[/i]
